tool_description: API to programmatically perform DNS lookups.
name: DNS Lookup
title: DNS Lookup

api_list.name: /Api/a/{domain}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dns-lookup2.p.rapidapi.com/Api/a/oxog.net"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dns-lookup2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
